projects.title: SEIM Platform
projects.description: Enterprise Security Information and Event Management platform for real-time threat detection, incident search, and security analytics.
projects.problem: Security teams needed a robust platform to detect, search, and manage security incidents across large-scale enterprise environments.
projects.solution: Built core features for incident search and storage using Solr for fast querying, Snowflake for data warehousing, and Kafka for real-time event streaming.
projects.architecture: Java backend with Grails framework, Solr search engine, MySQL and Snowflake for storage, Kafka for event streaming, JavaScript frontend.
impactMetrics: Handled security event data at enterprise scale
Improved incident search and retrieval performance
Contributed to core platform used by security teams globally
highlights: Real-time security event processing with Kafka
Fast incident search powered by Solr
Scalable data storage with Snowflake integration

projects.title: Emotion AI Application

impactMetrics: Successfully launched AI-based emotion capture product
